Sentencas: Our recent achievements suggest that intermediate temperature (IT) solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) can become a strong competitor not only for stationary power generation, but also for tractionary applications, e.g. for electrical (hybrid) vehicles.
Titulo: Advantages of intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells for tractionary applications

Sentencas: These ITSOFCs are based on ceria-salt composite ceramic materials.
Titulo: Advantages of intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells for tractionary applications

Sentencas: These new ceria-based composite ceramic materials have shown a super ionic conductivity (0.1-1.0 S cm(-1)) in the IT region (400-600 degreesC).
Titulo: Advantages of intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells for tractionary applications

Sentencas: Using them as the electrolytes the ITSOFCs are operated between 300 and 1500 mA cm(-2) (200-700 mW cm(-2)) continuously between 400 and 600 degreesC.
Titulo: Advantages of intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells for tractionary applications

Sentencas: The opportunities and advantages of these new advanced ITSOFCs for electrical vehicle applications are discussed.
Titulo: Advantages of intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells for tractionary applications

Sentencas: The high efficiency ITSOFCs fed directly with hydrocarbon containing gas-type and liquid-type fuels have shown an enormous potential for application in electrical vehicles.
Titulo: Advantages of intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells for tractionary applications
